import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import RoleDashboard from '../components/RoleDashboard'; import SearchBar from '../components/SearchBar'; import ProgressTracker from '../components/ProgressTracker'; import DashboardStats from '../components/DashboardStats'; const Home = () => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); const isLoggedIn = !!localStorage.getItem('token'); // Mock stats for demonstration const demoStats = [ { title: 'Total Complaints', value: 1234, type: 'complaints', trend: 12, description: 'Issues reported this month' }, { title: 'Resolved Issues', value: 987, type: 'resolved', trend: 8, description: 'Successfully resolved' }, { title: 'Active Volunteers', value: 156, type: 'volunteers', trend: 15, description: 'Community helpers' }, { title: 'Pending Tasks', value: 89, type: 'pending', trend: -5, description: 'Awaiting resolution' } ]; const progressSteps = [ { title: 'Register', description: 'Create your account' }, { title: 'Report', description: 'Submit your complaint' }, { title: 'Track', description: 'Monitor progress' }, { title: 'Resolve', description: 'Issue gets fixed' } ]; const handleSearch = (query) => { console.log('Searching:', query); }; if (isLoggedIn) { return ; } return (

); }; export default Home;
